sentences.english: Again, this makes it possible to recreate previous releases of your software.
sentences.chinese: 同样，这使你能够重新构建旧版本的软件。

sentences.english: They are generally more reliable than earlier versions.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常要比旧版本更可靠。

sentences.english: You can, and should, watch an older version of the lectures online.
sentences.chinese: 你能在网上找到这本教材的旧版本，应该读一下。

sentences.english: Before it was amended, Chinese advertising law had been in place for 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 此次修订之前，旧版广告法已经施行了二十年。

sentences.english: Some people deliberately choose to use older versions.
sentences.chinese: 有些人故意选择旧版本使用。

sentences.english: Don't hesitate to save your old versions.
sentences.chinese: 保存旧版本的时候不要犹豫。

sentences.english: It's pretty hard to sell a high-end phone with an old version of the OS.
sentences.chinese: 销售装有旧版操作系统的高端机相当有难度。

sentences.english: In an update, all the old versions must be shut down.
sentences.chinese: 程序升级的时候，所有旧版本都必须关掉。

sentences.english: The new edition improves on the original book.
Users of older versions can follow this tutorial to do so.
sentences.chinese: 旧版本的用户可以根据这个教程来升级。

sentences.english: Restore an older version of the schema when we push out bad code.
sentences.chinese: 产生错误代码时可恢复到一个旧版本的模式。

sentences.english: The original model's e-ink screen measured 6 inches diagonally, roughly equivalent to a typical paperback.
sentences.chinese: 旧版的电子墨水屏幕6寸，约为一般平装本书的大小。

definition: to revise the current edition/revised edition
to make a copy/to reproduce/to remake (a movie)
to reproduce photographically/to duplicate/to adapt (as a movie)/to remake (a movie)/adaptation/reproduction/remake
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
